mapper.select: select * from board order by seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(seq, title , contents, writer, pw, time) values((select max(seq)+1 from board), #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, #{pw}, sysdate )
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, pw = #{pw}, time = sysdate where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select count(id) from member where id = #{writer}
